CHAT.comment: child touches dog's back while dog moves tail and head.
child touches dog's back and dog sits down.
mom moves dog by its leg.
child touches dog's back and dog sits down.
mom nods and child picks dog up.
mom pretends to throw food to dog and dog makes noise.
mom and child wave in front of dog's head and dog starts walking.

child is pointing finger at tank in different places like she's counting something.

mom motions child over to her and snaps her pants.
mom nods and child continues to wave hand over computer box.

mom nods and child puts fingers on top of cage again and jerks them away.
